abstractText: Based on historic gage station readings, flood prone height (FPH) and flood pronewidth (FPW) provide a clear representation of the big event (approximately onceevery fifty years) flooding potential of a stream in a particular reach. Landformalso provides clues to this potential, but without the numerical designations
title: Channel Metrics: Flood Prone Height (FPH) and Flood Prone Width (FPW) v1.0
